00021 };

00032 #define W_MODIFIED    0x0001  // flag set if workspace is modified
00033 
00034 /*
00035    because of working with int's
00036    switching to unsigned int will
00037    cause problems with returncode 
00038    on error :(
00039 */
00040 #define MEM_MAX  0x7FFFFFFF
00041 #define MEM_AUTO -2
00042 
00043
